text:
No problem at all!

Yeah you do have the option to go the identity route instead but ultimately this makes it more difficult to challenge in the future if there are issues along the side of "ah, a cent was missed in tax, now I owe a million".

On issues like these, I highly recommend you discuss with your legal representation to ensure that the business understands the risk from every angle as while it can be easy to drop into the mindset of "it's just another sales platform".

The reality is many of these platforms have webs upon webs upon webs and if you get caught in _one_ it can often affect your entire pipeline. I hope this has helped but always happy to weigh in if you have any additional concerns! :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank You. I totally can see that and I think it’s all right. It’s more the concern obviously to add the SSN. Nobody likes that. Seems as it is…
